 92:     Unnormalized double gaussian


 93: 


 94:     .. math::


 95:         f(x;mean,\sigma_L,\sigma_R) =


 96:         \\begin{cases}


 97:             \exp \left[ -\\frac{1}{2} \left(\\frac{x-mean}{\sigma_L}\\right)^2 \\right], & \mbox{if } x < mean \\\\

 136:     .. math::


 137:         f(x; mean, \sigma) = \\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}

 287:     """


 288:     Unnormalized Novosibirsk


 289: 


 290:     .. math::


 291:         f(x;\sigma, x_0, \Lambda) = \exp\left[


 292:             -\\frac{1}{2} \\frac{\left( \ln q_y \\right)^2 }{\Lambda^2} + \Lambda^2 \\right] \\\\


 293:         q_y(x;\sigma,x_0,\Lambda) = 1 + \\frac{\Lambda(x-x_0)}{\sigma} \\times


 294:         \\frac{\sinh \left( \Lambda \sqrt{\ln 4} \\right)}{\Lambda \sqrt{\ln 4}}


 295: 


 296:     where


 297:         - width = :math:`\sigma`


 298:         - peak = :math:`m_0`


 299:         - tail = :math:`\Lambda`


 300: 


 301:     """


 302:     #credit roofit implementation


 303:     cdef double qa

 305:     cdef double qc

 *     cdef double lqyt
 *     if width < smallestdiv: return badvalue             # <<<<<<<<<<<<<<
 *     xpw = (x-peak)/width
 *     if fabs(tail) < 1e-7:
 */
  __pyx_t_1 = (__pyx_v_width < __pyx_v_7probfit_3pdf_smallestdiv);
  if (__pyx_t_1) {
    __pyx_r = __pyx_v_7probfit_3pdf_badvalue;

    goto __pyx_L3;
  }
  __pyx_L3:;

 *     cdef double lqyt
 *     if width < smallestdiv: return badvalue
 *     xpw = (x-peak)/width             # <<<<<<<<<<<<<<
 *     if fabs(tail) < 1e-7:
 *         qc = 0.5*xpw*xpw
 */
  __pyx_t_2 = (__pyx_v_x - __pyx_v_peak);

 */

 */

    goto __pyx_L4;

 *         if qa < smallestdiv: return badvalue
 *         qb = sinh(qa)/qa
 */
    __pyx_v_qa = (__pyx_v_tail * sqrt(log(4.)));

    /* "probfit/pdf.pyx":316
 *     else:
 *         qa = tail*sqrt(log(4.))
 *         if qa < smallestdiv: return badvalue             # <<<<<<<<<<<<<<
 *         qb = sinh(qa)/qa
 *         qx = xpw*qb
 */

 *         qy = 1.+tail*qx
 */
    __pyx_t_2 = sinh(__pyx_v_qa);

    __pyx_v_qx = (__pyx_v_xpw * __pyx_v_qb);
